author: Whitney James
comment: Moto 360 1st gen. with ambient display and tilt to wake turned on this watch face would keep waking the CPU and blink the display on/off severely impacting battery drain (~20% per hour) Otherwise liked it. Bug can probably be fixed.
title: Battery drain bug

author: Mike Lewis
comment: Color options along with night and day colors make this a regular watch face. I'd like date options but great otherwise.
title: Using This Alot

author: Richard Flores
comment: Cool & simple watch face!. If have a setting to select the font size will be great, especially the day and month.
title: Simple & nice look!

author: Nino Sidari
comment: Love the look, but had to charge my watch in the middle of the day.
title: Totally killed my battery

author: Nikolaos Beratlis
comment: I am using a Asus Zenwatch2 with Nexus 5x. I installed the application. The app says it is installed in Google Play but I don't see it in my phone. How can I use it to rotate the watch face?

reply.author: Apps by Ross Beazley
reply.content: use the android wear app and press the settings cog on the watch face icon

author: Zeljko Finzgar
title: It killed my battery in half day

author: Chris Pugh
comment: Plain and simple, and probably my favourite, even ignoring the rotation feature.
title: A fantastic digital watch face

author: diaz wang
comment: Battery drain so fast

author: Udaya Gunathilaka
comment: Simple and nice design, working perfectly with ZenWatch2
title: Love it

author: Рафаэль Хасанов
comment: Не работает

author: Charlie Anzman
comment: Simply great ... Literally. Nice job!

author: Rama chandran
comment: Very good

author: Sam Kramer
comment: Nice look

author: Eric Quah
comment: How do I set the black watchface as default?  Keeps going back to white each time I turn the watch on.
title: Nice minimalist design

author: Eldorel Dahknal
comment: The dev seems to be very responsive, and the rotation is exactly what i wanted. If there was a 24h display option it would be amazing, but without it I have to keep looking.
title: Looks nice, convienient

author: Paul Russell
comment: I really do like it, but I wish you could change the red. I'm just not a fan of red. It's pretty much what I was looking for other than that. If there was an option to change that color, it would be perfect.

reply.author: Apps by Ross Beazley
reply.content: what colours are you interested in?

title: I do like it, but...

author: Rondale Williams
comment: I love this watch face and use it everyday. I just wish the date still showed when my watch face blackens.
title: Needs date in doze mode

author: Camiel Hirschberg
comment: It's really nice and clean but hampered by the lack of 24h mode.

author: Guillaume Pasquet
comment: Love it but it really needs a 24h time display.
title: Good but need 24h display

author: julian sharp
comment: Great but Would be perfect if it had 24 hrs mode.
title: 24he mode

author: Tayyab Ahmed
comment: By default moto 360 have a watch face like this with more customizations.

author: Liam McCann
comment: Great wee watch

author: Jorge Antonio Garza Peña
comment: A great looking and functional watchface. It is just a little bit annoying to have the icon in the app drawer just for some minor settings, try to place them inside the android wear app. Thanks! Keep up the good work!

reply.author: Apps by Ross Beazley
reply.content: This has been implemented for you, if you would like an early look into new features please check out the beta release at https://play.google.com/apps/testing/uk.co.rossbeazley.wear

title: Very original! Please try to hide the icon from the app drawer

author: Kyle Yount
comment: It's funny how you guys are trying to sell this watch face with the rotating gimmick, but what you aren't realizing is that this watch has the best-looking face in the app store that includes a calendar. The rotation feature is cute, but thank you for finally making something functional that isn't horrendous to look at.
title: Best

comment: But I think when you have a notification the clock needs to shrink. Because the notification hides half of the time. Which is no good.

reply.author: Apps by Ross Beazley
reply.content:
Please update, this feature has now been implemented.

thanks

Ross

title: This app is just what I wanted

author: Harry Sibenaler
comment: Awesome, Simple  Love the app, this is the watch face I've been looking for. Not really looking for the rotating part, but the design is great!  Would love to see 24hr format support on this though..

author: Paul Christopher
comment: FINALLY!  I've been waiting for someone to make a watch face that works for those of us who prefer to wear our watches face down....    ...unfortunately, I can't get it to rotate.  Moto 360.

reply.author: Apps by Ross Beazley
reply.content: Can you let me know what version of google play services you have, also what phone and OS version have you got. I'll try and sort it for you. Thanks.

author: Mike B
comment: Just one major thing for me - could you add a 24hr version please?
title: Like..

author: Matt Ward
comment: Nice clean design. Would be great with 24hr mode as well as watch battery & phone battery percentages.
title: Nice elegant design.

author: Keith Mitchell
comment: Lovely, clear and simple. My new favourite watch
title: Simple and elegant

author: Vala Zadeh
comment: Needs a black theme and a more visible second counter

author: Richard Ely-Harris
comment: ... if the seconds are to show in my opinion the need to be a darker font please.
title: Great design but...

author: Sharon Johnston
comment: love the simple face.  would be nice to change colors, perhaps black background :)

author: Tasha Williams
comment: Doesn't rotate
title: Moto 360

author: Alexander Acriptis
comment: Anyway the best minimal digital watch face
title: Add 24hrs format please

author: Miguel Castro
comment: Don't care much about the rotation.
title: Perfect design

author: Simon McDonough
comment: ...knowing that should my watch arm ever need to be surgically reattached, I need not concern myself that the surgeon will put it back the right way round.    With this app I can rotate the watch face to compensate for all kinds of surgical errors and malpractice!  Nice clean lines and easy to read, although if you allow the colours to be configurable I'll give you an extra star...

reply.author: Apps by Ross Beazley
reply.content:
some basic colour support is now implemented in the beta at https://play.google.com/apps/testing/uk.co.rossbeazley.wear

please check it out and let me know what you think

title: Can now live life to the full...

author: Chris Sawczuk
comment: I have spent literally minutes looking for a watch face that rotates and then I came across this sorry piece of virtual clockwork. I won't lie, since installing the watch face, my ability to tell the time hadn't had any negative impact, but I can't wait to be able to rotate the face an arbitrary amount of degrees.
title: Can't believe it doesn't rotate arbitrary degrees

author: james shephard
comment: 10 out of 10 ... of the available numerals are used to display times.
title: Amazoid

author: Matthew Crouch
comment: Simple, clear, stylish clock face!
title: Nice Clock Face
